title: Definitions
context: ยง166E-2 Definitions. For the purposes of this chapter: &ldquo;Agricultural activities&rdquo; means the care and production of livestock, livestock products, poultry, or poultry products, or apiary, horticultural, or floricultural products, or the planting, cultivating, and harvesting of crops or trees. &ldquo;Aquacultural activities&rdquo; means the farming or ranching or any plant or animal species in a controlled salt, brackish, or freshwater environment; provided that the farm or ranch is on or directly adjacent to land. &ldquo;Board&rdquo; means the board of agriculture. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of agriculture. &ldquo;Non-agricultural park lands&rdquo; means lands that are not designated as agricultural parks pursuant to chapter 166. [L 2003, c 90, pt of ยง1; am L 2006, c 157, ยง2]
